![](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/158074695?v=4)

# Parameter committee

The parameter committee, initially bootstrapped by IOG, EMURGO, and the Cardano Foundation, along with members of the stake pool operator community, discusses all protocol parameters, including network, technical, and economic parameters, providing non-binding recommendations.

## 1 contributors

![](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/158074695?v=4)

## Would you like to suggest changes to this glossary?

We encourage you to actively participate in the creation and moderation of our contentâ€”your contributions are invaluable. All content is reviewed by another community member.
